item.title: Escape The Aquarium
item.description:
About This Game

This is a world fabricated by mysterious creatures
Explore the box court level and find the corresponding puzzle solving items
Escape this strange place before exhaustion!


But be careful of the invisible countdown



If you are injured, you need to replenish your supplies in a timely manner


A slightly retro style
The double ending of "not wasting too much of your time"

item.title: Toribash Next
item.description:
About This Game

THE NEXT GREAT FIGHTING GAME

Toribash Next is the sequel to Toribash, the award-winning turn-based sandbox fighting game. Toribash revolutionized the genre by allowing players to create their own moves during a match, using easy-to-understand 3D physics tools. Toribash Next takes fighting games to the next level with weapons, four-player battles and a new replay editor, plus more of the customization and modding options that made the original game a fan favorite.

WHERE WILL YOU STRIKE NEXT?

Challenge your friends to a bloody four-player free-for-all, or team up for freestyle tricking and parkour exhibitions. Change the rules, spawn items and even alter the environment right in the middle of a match. Create epic martial-arts replays by editing in new moves after the fact. Toribash Next gives you the freedom to make the moves youâ€™ve dreamed of making... and play the way youâ€™ve dreamed of playing!

FEATURES

â€¢ Innovative turn-based gameplay with 3D body movement and
physics
â€¢ 20 different articulation points that can be manipulated in each
turn (21 with weapons)
â€¢ Game modes include Classic, Samurai Fight, Aikido and Gun
Duel
â€¢ All-new 3- and 4-player modes, including team fights and freefor-all
â€¢ Equippable weapons including guns, swords and staves
â€¢ New Replay Editor lets you return to any point in a completed
fight and change the outcome
â€¢ Wide variety of character, environment and rule customizations
â€¢ In-game economy: Buy and sell custom characters and mods
â€¢ Player-hosted servers

item.title: Watch The Fish
item.description:
About This Game

Keep the fish water in jar as long as possible ! Watch The Fish is an arcade game where you have to show your dexterity to manage the fish water and get the best possible score. Choose to turn the wheel of fortune at your own risk.

Features

  • Fishes
  • World leaderboard of goldfish lovers
  • Stats and achievements
  • Constantly increasing entropy controlled by an invisible force
  • Chill and annoying songs
  • Many fishes
  • Weather events
  • Different endings to unlock
  • Coins, diamonds and many many fishes !

For Steam Deck players

For a unique gaming experience, the fishjar angle can be controlled by the console gyroscope. Please make a try.
Enable it in Steam Input by selecting a "Gamepad with Gyro" profile.
The gyro should act as the right joystick and always be activated (check the Gyro settings).

item.title: Dracula Awakens
item.description:
About This Game

Dracula Awakens is a short horror game about Dracula's return to this world.

A world where you desperately need to keep your job. And to do so, you offer to get evidence about the disappearance of a man in Dracula's castle, which was a tourist attraction before the incident.

Since the police didn't care about the immigrant man, you will find out what happened to him.

Welcome to Dracula's Castle




Here you will find:

  • An ancient vampire lord with his wife chasing you
  • Retro style low poly graphics
  • Unique puzzles
  • A castle and catacombs to explore
  • Bats and ghosts to use your super flash camera
  • Multiple endings
  • Manual save in the save room (no newbie-friendly autosave)

Gameplay




Simple and effective as it looks: A camera with a super flash ready to aim and shoot, enemies and your limited medicine to heal if you are surprised from behind.

The Castle


Solve unique puzzles and explore the castle while surviving.



Please note: This game is an experience that can be completed in under 2 hours and is aimed at players who enjoy old school survival horror games.

item.title: The Witch's Cauldron
item.description:
About This Game


ABOUT THIS GAME

The Witch's Cauldron is a narrative roguelike game about... guess what?.. being a witch.

You are a witch living on the outskirts of a small medieval town with her cat. Potions are your tools of choice. With your cauldron you brew your way through the world. But you've got to keep your balance. On one side of the scales is the terror you bring. On the other - your fame among the people. If the scales are tipped too much, someone will definitely come for your life. But it doesn't really matter, for your soul was lost long ago. And the cycle will continue.

While the shadow of the inquisition is yet far away, peasants, townsfolk and even the king himself are coming to pay their respects to you. Listen to their problems, learn their mysteries, unlock new recipes, and keep in mind that your benevolent or malevolent intentions will surely make a difference.

Branching narrative.

Meet a cast of weird petitioners with their incessant requests. Help them or follow your own agenda. Uncover secrets, play with people's fates or just make the cows sing. Potions you choose to brew for your visitors influence future events.

Potion discovery.

You begin knowing only a couple of basic recipes, but by experimenting with mixes you can unlock new ones. Not every problem can be solved with rat poison (but nothing stops you from trying). And no matter what gruesome end you've met in your last cycle, you get to keep all unlocked recipes. If you hit a block in your research, you can always ask for help, but are you ready to pay the price?

Keep the balance.

Don't let fame or fear get to your head. And remember: peasants have pitchforks and there's a lot of them.

Plethora of endings.

The multitude of potions and plot twists ensure high replayability. Some recipes, game mechanics and endings become unlocked only when certain conditions are fulfilled (like beating the main story or getting some game-ending events).

A cat.

You have one and you can pet him.

item.title: Chef Chen
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1335360


"Chef Chen" is a multiplayer cooperative hunting and cooking game designed for 1 to 4 players. Chef Chen and his companions own a restaurant that is facing severe financial constraints. To quickly earn a significant income, they must participate in high-risk cooking competitions. As part of Chef Chen's skilled cooking team, you and your fellow players embark on an adventurous journey in a fantastical world of culinary challenges.

Chef Chen, who uses insulated gloves as boxing gloves; Parsley, the Samurai Shiba Inu who believes two swords are never enough; Bay, the archer with unparalleled accuracy shooting arrows with their feet; and the innocent-looking yet fiercely formidable magician cat Pepper. Together, the four of you venture into a different world to face exciting challenges!

Being a qualified chef requires more than just chopping meat and stir-frying!

During the competition, you must gather ingredients on the spot, from stealing Harpy's Egg, slicing Red Scallion, peeling Aethercap, to hunting Cockatrice. Each ingredient must be obtained through your own efforts, and completing orders within the time limit earns you rewarding stars!

Teamwork is everything!

If you think that everyone simply needs to excel at their own tasks to easily win the competition, you are mistaken! In addition to wandering monsters and various obstacles, the fantasy world is filled with hurdles and mechanisms. With limited cooking knives, magic vines, trebuchets, floor mechanisms, and seesaws, your success depends on the level of cooperation and synchronization with your teammates!

Mysterious colossal mythical creatures!

While you are focused on hunting monsters and collecting ingredients, mythical creatures that extend beyond the boundaries of stories emerge from the depths of the fantasy world, adding an extra level of excitement and challenge to your already bustling competition!

Adventure with new partners!

Whether you prefer to take on the challenge alone or gather friends and family to form a team, you will encounter exhilarating challenges in a variety of levels. Unlocking new stages and locations, and if your culinary skills are exceptional, you may even recruit new chef companions to join your team, adding more creativity and strategy to your upcoming levels!

Each partner must play their role, collaborate, and serve one delicious dish after another, conquering the discerning taste buds of the judges and earning applause and rewards!

item.title: æ— ç•èˆ°é˜Ÿï¼šç‚®ç«æˆ˜äº‰ï¼ˆNoah City:Rise of the conquerorï¼‰
item.description:
About This Game

In the year 2065, the world is in chaos. Climate change has caused sea levels to rise, flooding coastal cities and displacing millions of people. The old world order has collapsed, and three powerful factions have emerged to vie for control of the planet, each with a different vision for the new world.

Gone are the days of conventional warfare; now, cutting-edge war machines like futuristic aircraft carriers, stealthy submarines, and powerful destroyers take center stage. Human technology advances at an unprecedented pace, resulting in the creation of the ultimate war machine: the AI Scourge Legion.

However, the relentless evolution of AI technology endows the Scourge Legion with autonomous consciousness, prompting it to seek control over Earth. Each of the three factions believes that they can defeat the AI Scourge Legion and become the new rulers of the planet. As a skilled military commander, players must choose a faction, lead its development, strive to unite the world under their banner, and ultimately become the master of the new world!



â˜…Precise restoration of legendary warshipsâ˜…

Over 150 legendary warships, submarines and aircraft carriers are restored precisely in the game, enabling players to build a loyal naval fleet.



â˜…Classic styles of sea wars! Just sink all the enemy warshipsâ˜…

Aim for the ocean! Feel the excitement and the glory in the warship battles while you are conquering the world!



â˜…Diverse warship gears for you to DIY to handle all kinds of battlefieldâ˜…

Automatic artillery, anti-aircraft guns, armor, radar, propulsion devices and other gears can all be freely constructed by yourself. How to survive in the dangerous battlefield? It all depends on you, the commander!



â˜…Dominate the vast sea area with Air and Sea armiesâ˜…

Build a fighter workshop to load carrier-exclusive fighter jets. Milanese and Raptor fighter jets are always at your service.



â˜…Only the strong ones can survive in the storm-like warsâ˜…

There are still many more commanders with superior wisdom and strength among three allied countries. Who can be the best of them to unify the three forces?



â˜…Be the leader of the battlefield by the cross-generation high technologyâ˜…

Storing up energy and working on future technologies will give you a chance to win from the start and bring higher battle effectiveness to your warships!

item.title: Summon Masters
item.description:
About This Game

This is a card and board game with the following features:

Deck Building: Players can build their own decks to battle with. Depending on different strategies and opponents, players can choose different cards to counter.

Tactical Gameplay: The game uses a 3x10 chessboard, and players can freely place cards to fight. Players need to develop tactics and arrange card positions and usage order within limited space.

Different Professions: Players can choose freely from four professions - swordsman, mage, monk, and archer. Each profession has different characteristics and skills, and players can choose according to their preferences and tactical needs.

Competitive Battles: Players can battle with other players after building their decks, and it is fun to fight with other people. Through battles with other players, players can improve their strength and tactical skills.

Team Dungeons: In addition to fighting against other players, players can also team up with others to challenge high-difficulty dungeons. Players need to defeat powerful bosses through cooperation and strategy to get more rewards and cards.

Special Challenges: Players can participate in special rules challenges and use their intelligence to defeat other players. These special rules make the game more interesting and challenging, and players need to constantly think and try new strategies.

Fast-paced: Each game is fast-paced (within 5 minutes), and can be played in short fragments of time. The fast pace of the game allows players to enjoy the game in a short time, while also being able to play at any time and anywhere.

item.title: Ball is Life
item.description:
About This Game



Ball's a well-rounded fellow, but he soon finds himself in an existential crisis. Take Ball on a challenging and hilarious adventure as he jumps across the globe, scouring the round world for round friends who can help him live his best life. He's a small guy with big dreams, and while he can't bounce, he makes up for it with a can-do attitude and a really cool hat! His intentions are noble, but he soon finds out that not everyone supports his bravery.




Jump, swerve, and jump again through a series of simple but tricky stages that will truly test your aim, control, and perception. Will you and Ball take the journey on 'Normal' mode for a fun challenge, or are you both willing to risk it for the biscuit with 'Baller' mode's aggressive timer and faster platforms?




A charming, silly, yet thoughtful cast of characters awaits you each step of your journey.



Bounce to the beat of a groovy hip-hop and lo-fi soundtrack while you and Ball seek out new friends for guidance (but mostly shenanigans).

Features

- Over 10 stages of precise 3D platforming.
- Charming dialogue with a crisp UI and vibey backgrounds.
- Time records: Challenge your friends or aim to be the best in the world!
- Balls!

item.title: Saiko no sutoka no shiki
item.description:
About This Game

Saiko No Sutoka No Shiki is a spin-off of the original game, Saiko No Sutoka. Itâ€™s a survival based on a horror game where you must escape from AI that activily hunts you down in unique ways.


KEY FEATURES

There are 3 new AI with different behaviours that can hunt our player in unique ways using trees to hide and stalk there prey below:

YUI (The Antagonist)

She is a new girl introduced in this spin off version and hostile to player; she attacks with scissors and can hide behind the tree to ambush you. She likes to throw some insults at you to lower your moral, then harrasses and kills Saiko. You must stop her in order to escape since she holds the key to the exit gate of the game.

SAIKO (The Zombie)

Saiko Chan came from the previous game Saiko No Sutoka, but this time she has turned into an undead. You need to get her help to defeat Yui, so that you can escape the game.
In order to defeat Yui, you might need to make sure Saiko becoming stronger and complete all her parts, then she can help you defeat Yui. Be aware! She can also get hungry and demand you to find her food or she might end up eating you instead.

ELISSU (The Yangire)

She was introduced as an easter in the previouse game, but in this mode she has her own dedicated mode; her AI is revamped to fit the new forest map. She has 3 phases in her complicated AI below:

Stalking Mode

This phase works when she stalks actively; she doesnâ€™t reveal her self or attacks. She will give you some hints by giggling, but you wonâ€™t know where its coming from until its too late.

Playful Mode

In this phase, she will attempt to get close to the player and shove the player around such as attemps to do combat with player and might harrass the player, but she wonâ€™t kill you; she likes to make sure the player doesnâ€™t reach the escape point.

Kill Mode

Be careful! In this phase, she will use any method to end the player and might resort to use many of her ways to finish the player without any hessitation.



Combat system player can use melee weapon to fend off against other enemies and tries to survive with fully block mechanic to block attacks inflicted by the enemies.

Randomly generated forest map with 3 variations that the player might have a hard time navigating around. AI will use some trees to stalk and hunt the player including climing the tree and using the bushes to hide and stalk.

Multiple endings of the game contains of 4 endings in total. They would be connected with each other in order to give a final conclusion. If all endings are finished, so multiple playthrough is a must in order to fully grasp the meaning of this spin off.

item.title: Little Loki & The Yggdrasil Maze
item.description:
About This Game



"Little Loki & The Yggdrasil Maze" is an RPG game produced by sugar*plum and published by Hanabi games.



A hundred years ago, the defeated Demon Lord Loki has now been resurrected! Disregarding the dissuasion of his former subordinates, Loki is determined to reach the Yggdrasil.
Despite Loki possessing the strength of a demon lord, he lost most of his power after resurrection. Faced with formidable enemies, can Loki successfully seek revenge?

This game is a role-playing type of game. Players will control the main character Loki, challenging the maze of theYggdrasil and defeating all encountered enemies. Along the way, they will also meet some companions willing to assist Loki. Help Loki reach the top of the World Tree smoothly!






  • Jrpg
  • Captivating story

item.title: Death Penalty Hero æ­»åˆ‘å‹‡è€…
item.description:
About This Game

The world doesn't need heroe anymore, humans and demons live together "peacefully" under the framework of the "law" ...... In the face of such falsehood and hypocrisy, a rogue has no ability to fight back, and "justice" can only be buried in one's heart?

Open world: Explore cities and labyrinths, discover stories, and find all kinds of weapons.



Recruitment: Solve their problems, get to know their hearts, and let them join your camp!


Equipment and Skills: Configure the right equipment to use the right skills, different combinations will be the key to win or lose the battle.


The daily life of an adventurer: without money you have to go on quests!


Arena: Improve your personal abilities by fighting!

item.title: Desktop Tourney World
item.description:
About This Game

Card pack opening and resource acquisition


Copper Coin Acquisition and Card Pack Purchase


Game features:
1.Card collection, over 400+ cards available to collect;
2.Career experience, the transition and change from mortal to monk;
3. Lifespan limitation, break through the lifespan limitation and pursue longevity;
4. Equipment wearing, equipment affects the combat effect of cards;
5. Encounter experience, specific time, specific events happen;
6. Exploration experience, small exploration levels, busy time.

From the developers:
Everyone will think that this game has copied ã€ŠStack Landsã€‹, admittedly, what you see may be thought that even the UI is not even lazy to modify, here we are very sorry.
At the same time, we are sorry and very grateful for the inspiration brought to us by ã€ŠStack Landsã€‹, we think it is a very good game mode, easy but not simple, in the stacked mode, we think there is still a lot of room to play, but we ask ourselves that we can't do it for the time being, but we hope that we don't add more to the snake. So we took the immortal as the theme, and added some elements that we think can be more enriched, such as card growth, life span limitations, exploration copies, etc., and at the same time, we thought to avoid affecting the experience of the stacking mode, which is not sure if it's a good thing or a bad thing, but it's an attempt.
This is a game developed by only two people, in the resources and time constraints, but also faced with the problem of survival, my partner and I do not have much choice, we had thought of doing space battles, but ultimately in this version did not materialize, and the future is also unknown. In the end, no matter whether you praise or curse, thank you very much for your attention to this game, I hope you have fun, and I hope you can support ã€ŠStack Landsã€‹. I hope you can support Stacked Continent. I also hope that there are people who can carry forward this mode better.

item.title: Crazy Monster
item.description:
About This Game

Crazy Monster

*brief introduction

A tower defense shooting game where players take on the role of a hero and defeat powerful and crazy monsters with their allies!

*Setting

The monsters have invaded our home, they are committing all sorts of crimes such as burning, killing, and looting. We cannot let them continue. We must stop the monsters and fight back!

*feature

You can defeat monsters with your superb combat power! Or strategize and use various defense towers and functional buildings in a reasonable manner to win step by step........

I hope you enjoy this game ^v^

After downloading "Crazy Monster", we will configure components for you for free, which can solve most startup problems that lack necessary game components

item.title: Taddle Quest
item.description:
About This Game

Prepare for adventure

Depending on whether you are in melee or long-range combat
You can enter battle with two sets of skills
You can switch between them at any time during the battle.
Do you want to be a mage or a fighter?
The choice is entirely yours.

New enemies are on the horizon!

The main focus of this game is on boss battles.
Powerful enemies will attack in a variety of ways.
Watch the enemy's movements carefully before you fight.

A freely matching equipment system

Each weapon has its own exclusive attack action.
You can freely mix and match the weapons in both hands
You can mix and match weapons in both hands to feel the difference.
When you change your equipment, the look also changes.
Match your fighting style to the characteristics of your equipment.

item.title: Heroes of Eternal Quest
item.description:
About This Game

No one could have imagined that the once peaceful world would be irretrievably lost. One day, everything fell apart, and the world turned into a massive pyramid. Various of creatures found homes on different "layers", each based on how high or low they were. With no physical paths connecting these layers, we could only travel using huge "portals".

The surviving humans live in the lowest, poorest areas of this new world. They call it the "Tower of Shards" and hope to reach the top of the world one day, breaking free from an unfair destiny.

While we won't give in to this strange fate, only a few people, known as "the Marked", can safely travel through the "portals". They're our last hope.

Endless Expeditions:

Since humans are living in areas with few resources, it's up to "the Marked" to start expeditions to bring back resources home. Unlock different characters, buildings, and items to equip your heroes and use their skills at the right time, making each journey unique.


Base Building & Gear Merge:

With the resources you've collected, you can build and expand human homes in many fun ways. As supplies grow and new buildings pop up, humans can start to help "the Marked" with all kinds of battle structures like buildings, gear, and other supplies. Expand your stronghold and merge equipment for stronger setups.


Strategic Deck Building:

With every new building in the stronghold, you'll unlock a bunch of fun, mysterious cards. The cards you use will change how you can support in battles. Always be ready to change up your cards based on what's happening in the expedition.


Real Time Hero Combat:

As things change on the battlefield, more and more "Marked" start to stand out. From brave warriors and strong knights to magical wizards and nature-loving druids, each has their special traits and skills. Use your leadership to recruit and lead them in the engaging real time combat.




Besides the Tower of Shards, there are also other races who want to reach the top. Be ready for anything happening, learn from your expeditions, go through more portals, climb higher, break free from humans fate, and fulfill this eternal quest.

item.title: Hoops World
item.description:
About This Game

It's just hoops... Or is it?



Relax and shoot some hoops in a variety of scenic locations. Choose from basic courts, or courts with challenging trick shots & long shots!

Immerse yourself in the world of first-person basketball, where players can test their shooting abilities on a range of courts.

Drawing inspiration from iconic shooter titles that included hidden (and often overlooked) basketball mini-games and physics-based novelty features, Hoops World allows you to discover the joy of sinking hoops and trick-shots in unique locations such as indoor courts, stadiums, beaches, and more!

Transforming a classic, quirky gaming element into a full-fledged FPS basketball experience, Hoops World is a great way to relax in your own world!



Along with various basketball courts and locations, Hoops World includes physics-based fun!

Drive vehicles around various racetracks, drifting and sliding around a variety of scenic locations in between sinking hoops and exploring!

Find many different physics-based objects to play around with. Hoops World is your world - play any way you like!

item.title: FLAKE The Legend of Snowblind
item.description:
About This Game

FLAKE
COLDEST POINT AND CLICK ADVENTURE EVER

Embark on this MYSTICAL journey in the role of FLAKE, an incredible creature.
Will you be able walk the THIN WHITE LINE BETWEEN GOOD AND EVIL?
What will you do with your chance to save the world that is hanging on a thread?

Prepare your PIPE and finest tobacco or a warm cup of TEA and get ready for long sleepless nights...
just like back in GOLDEN AGE of point and clicks with Lucas art adventures like Monkey island, Full throttle or Indiana Jones...
only this time FROZEN COLD.
Story driven adventure, hand drawn characters, smart puzzles, and witty humor, wrapped in unique graphical style.
YEARS in the making.
Fully HAND-DRAWN and with classical FRAME-BY-FRAME animation.
More then 20 Fully VOICED characters and original SOUNDTRACK.

item.title: Dungeons and Robots
item.description:
About This Game

Dungeons & Robots is an Online Action Shooter RPG, where players team up to battle various enemies, collect resources and dominate territories. Features include, fast-paced combat; elaborate crafting and inventory system; customizable characters, weapons, armour, powers and Â skills; procedurally generated environments and items; solo missions, 1-4 player co-op, and guilds. Explore these futuristic dungeons to fight, conquer and dominate.

Current Features:
  • 1-4 Multiplayer - Find your posse, explore massive dungeons, complete missions and lay claim to your territory.
  • Procedurally Generated Levels - Force you to stay alert and hope your team has your back.
  • Randomly Generated Equipment - Allows you to select a variety of items that best matches your play style and efficiently upgrades your character.
  • Environment - Navigate monster infested dungeons and caverns to kill the enemy and collect valuable crystals.
  • Customization - Modular approach allows you to customize your Character, Armour and Weapons.
  • Guild - Join a Guild to upgrade your character quicker, conquer and control your territory, and compete agains other Guilds.
  • Crafting - Collect crystals and craft "Legendary" items to upgrade your character and create a powerful robot.
  • Weapons - Protect your comrades and obliterate your enemies with 7 awesome Weapon catagories.
  • Enemies - Battle a variety of aggressive enemies and encounter epic boss battles in fast paced action.
  • Single Player - Explore the environments, collect crystals, engage in fierce battles and upgrade your character.

Features in Development:
  • Levels and Maps- 2 massive additional dungeons.
  • Additional Content - Characters, Weapons, Armours and Enemies.
  • Modes - PVP mode, 1 vs.1, 4 vs. 4, and Free Arena.
  • Trading - Auction House.
  • Select Additional Features - Full Controller Support, enhanced player communication and paring, and optimized networking functionality.

Story - Background:
  • Planet Earth, the once beautiful blue globe and thriving civilization, is now nothing more than a wasteland. Unable to sustain any form of life, the population is destitute of a habitation, and struggling to survive. With no where to run, their only option is a distant space colony, Planet TSI-5, where darkness is tangible and the unknown permeates the air.

    Upon their arrival, the colonists survey this foreign territory and stumble upon mineral in crystal form. After further examination it becomes evident this is no ordinary crystal. Much time is spent studying and experimenting with this mineral, and eventually the composition of the crystals is decoded, revealing the incredible powers imbued within them. The researchers continue to explore the most effective methods of extracting various energies from these crystals and their many applications.

    They name it Pure Crystal, a rather simple name for something retaining powers never witnessed before by the human race; the power of opening portals to parallel universes.

    It becomes obvious that Pure Crystal is the key to survival, and a resource worthy waging war over. The colonist engineer a clan of powerful robots whose task is to hunt the nearby planets for large deposits of Pure Crystal. After an exhaustive search, a planet is discovered with an abundance of Pure Crystal deposits. However, the residents of that planet are well prepared to defend against invaders who want to plunder their valuable mineral. You are one of the robots, and are now tasked to secure and deliver this Pure Crystal back to TSI-5.

    Make a Guild, fight a war, and bring it home. it is the sole purpose of your creation.

item.title: Chronicle Survivors
item.description:
About This Game

Join the Community! https://discord.gg/QbG67nFBv8

IMPORTANT: This game is ACTUALLY different!


Get ready to re-learn how to fight. This game features a unique combat system with a mix of survivors abilities, combat tricks, agile dashing and active abilities. It'll take time to master! Don't worry, survivors exist to perish. You control your character fully, at all times, based on complex inputs - you will never sit there while an animation plays.

This game's combat will take practice: at first you will find it hard to survive even a minute. To win and master combat you will have to slow down and pay attention, pressing random buttons in a panic will only send your survivor to an even earlier grave. You will learn how to move, how to use momentum to hit HARD, you will make up your own moves and fight in your own style.

An unforgiving, difficult Roguelite experience.

Chronicle Survivors is an Unreal Engine powered gorgeous action roguelike game with short (5-15 minutes), hardcore and meaningful objectives, thoughtful progression, variety of levels, loads of unique mechanic enemies and, of course, grindy epic loot with a continuous development path.

Take control of a survivor with a single life, that you lead to defeat the domain menace!

Each run is totally unique!

There are many roads to becoming victor. The arenas and enemies are ever changing, no two runs are the same!

Strategise your way to victory - combat skills alone are not enough!

Deal with random events, collect powerful loot, unlock new abilities, and unearth hidden secrets as you progress through the game. Your decisions matter, and every choice could mean the difference between survival and succumbing to the ever-present peril.

item.title: Buster's TD
item.description:
About This Game

Join the next evolution of tower defense gameplay with Busters TD!


Embrace the innovative spirit of indie gaming with Busters Tower Defense, where strategy meets chaos in a physics-driven world. With an emphasis on replayability and crazy gameplay, dive into a game that stands tall among other TD classics.

A Tower Defense Experience with Endless Possibilities


  • Every playthrough challenges your strategic prowess. Can you position your towers to win or will you take advantage of glitches to break your enemies spirits?



Dynamic Physics That Amplify the Fun


  • Physics-based interactions ensure that no two battles are the same. Master the mayhem to outmaneuver and obliterate your adversaries.




Expand, Fortify, and Dominate


  • Grow your base and deploy an array of towers. Harness the power of your personal drone for strategic advantage and secure victory over your enemies.



Customization at Your Fingertips


  • Design and personalize your enemies. Upload images to decide who you'll be fighting against.

It's not just tower defense, it's Buster's world, and it's waiting for you to conquer it. Your strategy, your victories. Welcome to the next-gen of tower defenseâ€”where you don't just play the game, you shape it.

item.title: Dizzy Fight
item.description:
About This Game

Break into the world of Dizzy Fight - choose your character - a beautiful thief girl, or an ugly zombie, an astronaut, or an office worker, or perhaps a medieval knight - and fight against opponents in picturesque locations.

Each of the characters has their own superpower, such as launching a tyrannosaurus or a sports car at an opponent. Also, each character has their own combo techniques, but in order to use them, you need to score a certain number of points in a fight.
Currently, two game modes are available - against the PC and playing with a friend on the same PC (controller is required for local multiplayer).
A dynamic setting, a fun atmosphere, and vivid emotions are what Dizzy Fight will give you.

item.title: OrcinUS: Orca Pod Rescue
item.description:
About This Game

Your pod has been captured by a cruel marine park - only you can rescue all the orcas to reunite your family!

SWIM FOREVER


In this "Endless Swimmer" game, you play an orca swimming through the ocean, catching fish and avoiding dangers. The simple one-touch controls are easy for anyone to learn!

EXPLORE VIBRANT BIOMES


Your journey starts in a beautiful coral reef, but the quest to save your pod from cruel SlamWharf will bring you across the seas. Discover new food (and dangers) as you progress on your missions.

RESCUE YOUR POD


Unlock 4 unique playable orcas - each has different skills, swimming stats, and personality traits. Bring your family together!

COMPLETE CHALLENGES


Through dozens of unique missions, master the seas to level up your character and unlock new sights. The challenge doesn't stop there - several stats are also tracked for each swim, so you can always increase your high scores.

UNLOCK COOL POWERUPS


Grab powerups from helpful bubbles to slow time, gain lives, shatter obstacles, and more! Catch 6 fish in a row and your orca will gain a special boost. Plus, as you level up, additional powerups become available, so there's always more to explore.

item.title: Right and Down and Dice
item.description:
About This Game

Explore randomly generated card dungeons where you can only move Right and Down, use Dice to defeat mighty enemies, gather powerful artifacts and learn new abilities! Will you be able to escape from the dungeon?

ROGUELIKE GAMEPLAY

Each dungeon is randomly generated, so each game is unique! On each turn, the only decision you can make is to go right or down! Explore the card dungeon and fight against mighty enemies, get blessings in the sacred shrines or buy new powerful artifacts from the shopkeeper!

USE THE DICE TO FIGHT!

Each time you move to a new encounter card, you have to use your dice! The battle is divided in turns. In the player turn, roll the dice and place them on the enemies to defeat them! You can also place the dice in your skills to obtain different effects, like rolling more dice or healing yourself. But be careful, in the enemy turn they will attack you and activate their skills!

UNLOCKABLE ARTIFACTS, HEROES AND DUNGEONS

  • Unlock 6 heroes with different starting artifacts and skills to create your custom run!
  • More than 100 artifacts with a wide variety of effects that you can unlock with every game you play!
  • 30 different dungeons. Each one adds a new rule to the game and will increase its difficulty!
  • Daily Mode with randomly generated conditions!

item.title: GRAVEN
item.description:
About This Game


A faithful priest of the Orthogonal orderâ€“exiled unto death for a crime in defense of anotherâ€“you live again in a small boat, adrift in a swamp. A stranger ferries you to solid ground and bestows upon you a cryptic warning, along with a mysterious staff and book. Go forth, pious priest, alleviate suffering, uncover deceptions, and smash the eldritch perversions encroaching upon reality itself.



Perhaps you will even earn your peace.

A marriage between modern development tools and techniques with a stark late 90s aesthetic brings the first person action-adventure GRAVEN to life! Featuring character designs by Chuck Jones (Duke Nukem 3d, Half-Life) and the voice talent of Stephan Weyte (Blood, Fire Emblem, Dusk) in a dark yet distinct medieval fantasy experience.





  • Solve puzzles and scour lore to uncover the motives of the foul heretical sects behind the plagues and seasons undermining the land.
  • Spread fires, charge machinery, reveal hidden paths, and freeze rivers to walk across.
  • Discover new weapons and upgrade them at blacksmiths and alchemists to customize your capability.
  • Expand your horizons by returning to old stomping grounds with new abilities and seeing how far down the chasms go and what powers they hide.
  • Slay over twenty distinct enemies and three bosses in an ever broadening world across multiple biomes.
  • Band together with up to 7 friends in hectic cooperative play.
  • Walk the parallel path, lest you stumble into the recesses of the world and reality becomes only a bitter plaything.
